# Rob Wienhoff

> Rob Wienhoff is a Coding Logistics Expert who helps manufacturers improve industrial coding, marking, labeling, vision verification, and secondary packagingâ€”from line audits and vendor selection to integration, operator training, and support.

Based in St Charles, IL, Rob brings over 25 years of hands-on experience in industrial automation. He provides vendor-neutral consulting to optimize production lines for efficiency, traceability, and compliance across pharmaceutical, food & beverage, and automotive manufacturing.

## Pages

*   [Home](https://rwienhoff.com/): Overview of Rob's expertise, services, and client testimonials.
*   [About](https://rwienhoff.com/about.html): Learn more about Rob's background, experience, and core values.
*   [Services](https://rwienhoff.com/services.html): Detailed descriptions of consulting services offered, from line audits to support.
*   [Solutions](https://rwienhoff.com/solutions.html): Explore specific solutions for primary/secondary packaging, print-and-apply, and vision verification.
*   [Process](https://rwienhoff.com/process.html): Understand Rob's four-step methodology for successful project delivery.
*   [Contact](https://rwienhoff.com/contact.html): Get in touch with Rob Wienhoff for inquiries or to schedule a consultation.
*   [Free Line Audit](https://rwienhoff.com/audit.html): Book a complimentary audit to identify optimization opportunities for your production line.
